PrivacyPolicyPage.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicyPage.description: Learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
PrivacyPolicyPage.section1Content: We collect personal information that you provide directly to us, such as your name, email address, phone number, and payment information when you register for an account, make a booking, or contact our customer service.
PrivacyPolicyPage.section2Content: We use your information to process your bookings, provide customer support, send you promotional offers (if you've opted in), improve our services, and comply with legal obligations.
PrivacyPolicyPage.section3Content: We share your information with travel providers necessary to complete your booking, service providers who perform services on our behalf, and as required by law.
PrivacyPolicyPage.section4Content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure.
PrivacyPolicyPage.section5Content: Depending on your location, you may have rights to access, correct, or delete your personal information. Contact us to exercise these rights.
PrivacyPolicyPage.section6Content: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience on our website, analyze usage patterns, and deliver personalized content.

TermsOfServicePage.title: Terms of Service
TermsOfServicePage.description: Please read these terms carefully before using our services.
TermsOfServicePage.section1Content: By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations.
TermsOfServicePage.section2Content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and for all activities that occur under your account.
TermsOfServicePage.section3Content: All bookings are subject to availability and confirmation. Prices are subject to change without notice until your booking is confirmed.
TermsOfServicePage.section4Content: Cancellation and refund policies vary depending on the type of booking and the provider's terms. Please review the specific terms before making a booking.
TermsOfServicePage.section5Content: We are not liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages resulting from the use or inability to use our services.
TermsOfServicePage.section6Content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which our company is registered.
